channel.title: Server Moderation
channel.description: Hello, on my server normal characters can use such commands as ::bank and ::pickup, whilst when i set my characters to Moderators, they cannot do these commands, or any commands! Please help me :(

item.title: Server Moderation
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Go into your client, and search for the commands, so for instance, Hit Ctrl+F, and type in the search; ::pickup or pickup

You should then see; }else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner") || playerRights >= 2))

As ou can see, the pickupcommand is only for players with the rights 2 or above. So when you see yours, change it to the right youâ€™d like it to be .

Read full topic
